title: Frostbase
author: Frostbase
content: As the title suggest, I need about 20 tron to make an urgent transaction, I will pay you in USDT if you agreeMy trx wallet is: TNwGRtEYvEqfxtcF1paNKAZYq3BRcK9rKu

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Try https://fixedfloat.com/ ? I don't use Tron, but it should be 1.5 bucks.

comments.author: Frostbase
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on August 13, 2022, 09:28:14 PMTry https://fixedfloat.com/ ? I don't use Tron, but it should be 1.5 bucks.I want to use it to exchange my USDT TRC 20 tokens to ERC20 USDT, but on trust wallet, I need like 18 tron if I want to make a transaction, hence why I'm asking here for some tron. I would appreciate it highly if you could give me some

comments.author: Ihugbogo
comments.body: I hardly make transaction on Tron network.. I suggest you go to Binance and buy from their, it's cheaper .
